featured.text: Secondly, as people are drawn into the story, they tend to take the perspective of the characters and rehearse the plot unconsciously.
I remember that on my cruise I was required to formally plot our course, using the tide table, even though our goal was an island I could see quite clearly across the water in the distance. 44.

definition.zh_def: 情節；故事的發展或安排
definition.en_def: The main events of a story, devised and presented by the writer as an interrelated sequence.
definition.example: The plot of the movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
